description: Enjoy the best experience with us.
aboutlocation: Located at kilometer 29 Sambodja, a fishing spot in a natural and refreshing environment, making your fishing experience more comfortable.
aboutfishingPond: A spacious fishing pond with various types of fish, ensuring an enjoyable fishing experience.
aboutfamilyFriendly: Suitable for families, communities, and anglers from all backgrounds, with a comfortable atmosphere for everyone.
aboutcompetition: Regular fishing competitions with attractive prizes, adding excitement for anglers who want to compete.
facilityRestaurantDesc: Dine at our restaurant with a beautiful view.
facilityParkingDesc: Spacious and comfortable parking for your vehicles.
poolPlanCapt: In this section, visitors can see the complete layout of the fishing ponds available at our location. This plan will show the various pool areas, including fishing areas, rental pool areas. This plan will also show the facilities around the pond, such as parking, toilets, places to eat, and fishing equipment rental locations. With this plan, visitors can more easily choose a place that suits their fishing preferences.
goldFishCapt: This pond (numbered 1 on the plan) uses the 'Kiloan' system where the fishing system uses measurements based on the weight of the fish caught, namely per kilogram.
tilapiaFishCapt: The Tilapia Pond (numbered 2 on the plan) also uses a kilo system so that visitors who fish in this pond will be charged according to the number of fish they catch based on the number of fish they catch.
mixedFishCapt: Hourly Rental Pools are one of the fishing options at our tourist attractions which use a payment system based on time, namely per hour. Types of fish in this pond (goldfish, tilapia, snakehead fish, catfish, and gourami)
endangJokoDesc: Warung Makan Endang Joko is a comfortable place to relax and enjoy a delicious meal after fishing. This stall offers a friendly atmosphere and serves a variety of mouth-watering special menus, suitable for families and friends.
endangJokoCapacityDesc: This stall can accommodate up to 30 people, with a spacious and neatly arranged seating area, with direct views of the fishing pond.
galleryDescription: Big catches, beautiful views, it's all in our gallery!
